climbs.name: Wacky Waving Inflatable Flailing Armed Tube Man

content.description: Start low under the lip, get over the lip, once into slab it is easy V2, if that, for the rest. Getting over the lip into the slab is the crux. The slab is pretty easy.
content.protection: Pads. This is a slab problem, but it is pretty high. It was FA'ed in the dark around 12am.
content.location: It is on the Urban Adventure Boulder, on the way to Punani Boulder before the bridge.

content.description:
I was informed that route was sent before by Nathaniel Hanson or possibly J. Jager was the FA. Either way, if you know the name of the route, post it in a comment, so I can give the correct info....

Sds, make way up to slopers then to pocketish sidepull to right hand crimp. Go up to the top, crimp, jug match, move out to right, gain a high right mantle to finish.
content.protection: Pads and a spotter. Bad fall on top of a boulder if you blow the final moves.
content.location: This is on the Urban Adventure Boulder, on the way towards the Punani Boulder before the bridge.

content.description:
Start off

A River Runs Through It

, finish off

Snow Shoes

.
content.protection:
Pads and a spotter. It uses the same top out as

Snow Shoes

.
content.location: This is on the Urban Adventure Boulder, on the way to Punani Boulder before the bridge.

content.description:
Start as

Snow Shoes

then from pocket sidepull and right crimp on rail dyno up to jug finish same as

ARRTI

.
content.protection:
Pads and a spotter. Same finish as

ARRTI

.
content.location: This is on the Urban Adventure Boulder, on the way to the Punani Boulder before the bridge.

content.description: SDS. Make way up via crimps and arete, move out higher to left, match in huge jug, move out to sloper, flat cobble, hand heel match, mantle out to top jug. We gave it this name because for the stream running under the problem in spring.
content.protection: Pads and a spotter. Kinda nasty fall if you blow the finishing mantle.
content.location: This is on the Urban Adventure Boulder, on the way to the Punani Boulder before the bridge.

pathTokens: Denver Metropolitan Area Bouldering and Buildering
